languageKey.label: Import Office
Upload office file to Import:
Upload a Word 2003 file in the ".xml" format.
You cannot upload ".doc" files!
Upload a Excel 2003 file in the ".xml" format.
You cannot upload ".xls" files!
Upload a Open Office Writer file in the ".sxw" format.
Upload a Open Office Calc file in the ".sxc" format.
Notice:
Upload
[IMPORTED OFFICE FILE]
The uploaded file was not a valid Word 2003 XML file.
The uploaded file was not a valid Excel 2003 XML file.
You did not upload a file.
Sorry. No content could be extracted from the file you uploaded.
For some mysterious reason the temporary file variable pointed to a file OUTSIDE the typo3temp/ folder - thus we cannot delete it!
Temporary filename already in use...
Office Import
Zu importierende Datei hochladen:
Eine Word 2003 Datei im ".xml" Format hochladen.
Sie können keine ".doc" Dateien hochladen!
Eine Excel 2003 Datei im ".xml" Format hochladen.
Sie können keine ".xls" Dateien hochladen!
Eine Open Office Writer Datei im ".sxw" Format hochladen.
Eine Open Office Calc Datei im ".sxc" Format hochladen.
Hinweis:
Hochladen
[IMPORTIERTE OFFICE DATEI]
Leider konnte aus der hochgeladenen Datei kein Inhalt extrahiert werden.
Office Import
Pošalji (Upload) Word 2003 datoteku u ".xml" formatu.
Ne možete importirati ".doc" datoteke!
Pošalji (Upload) Excel 2003 datoteku u ".xml" formatu.
Ne možete importirati ".xls" datoteke!
Pošalji (Upload) Open Office Writer datoteku u ".sxw" formatu.
Pošalji (Upload) Open Office Calc datoteku u ".sxc" format.
Napomena:
Slanje (Upload)
[IMPORTIRANA OFFICE DATOTEKA]
